reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very high resolution, solidly built
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this camera with cautious optimism. I wasn't expecting a whole lot for under $100. When it arrived, I was impressed with the solid build & feel of the camera. My Canon cost 3 times what I paid for this camera, & this camera takes sharper pictures (the picture of our kitten was one of the first photos I took with it - - - check out the high resolution).I didn't really get a lot of info from the user's manual, but if you spend a little time with this camera, you learn a lot. I've never owned a camera with a mini sd card, & I did have an adapter on hand to upload the pictures I took to our laptop. There is a 'mode', 'menu' 18x zoom & different settings on the back of the camera that are easy to understand. I do wish that the zoom was more powerful than 18x, but I'm cool with it. The built in flash works great, too. There is a lot to like with this camera! I'm very happy with it.One thing I didn't mention in my original review is the quality of the videos with this camera, and the sound quality. I can't take videos indoors with my Canon . . . there usually isn't enough light. This camera, however, produces crystal clear, bright and colorful videos, even at night if there's a light on in the room. Great clarity & sound videos.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth the investment
reviews.reviewText: This camera is perfect for beginners interested in content creation. It is easy to operate, small in size, light in weight, but sturdy. The focus is good and the image quality is very clear. Highly recommend. So far, the battery life is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Digital Camera
reviews.reviewText: This is the second digital camera I own and I have to admit I love it! Very affordable for the high resolution it provides. I can flip the screen, adjust resolution for sharper pictures and best part is that it’s very compact. I can easily bring it with me since it’s perfect for traveling, very lightweight. Definitely worth buying it and would recommend to anyone looking for a camera on a budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to figure out
reviews.reviewText: Great camera, very affordable for what it provides. It has a screen that you can flip so you can see what you are doing in case you are vlogging or recording yourself. It brings everything you may need, an hdmi to micro or mini hdmi, im not sure which one, it is the larger of the two. It brings an SD card and it also brings 2 batteries.Great product overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For starters, I like that it's a type C charging cord which means the phone cord that goes everywhere with me will also charge the camera battery so one cord with me instead of multiple. It came with 2 batteries and a memory card meaning I'll always have a spare charged battery. It's compact enough to fit in my purse with no problem so it'll always be with me. I'm not the best photographer but this was easy to use with good quality pictures. Also switching between taking pictures and videos was not a problem. Overall I like this camera alot and will put it to good use with me grandbabies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Gave this to my granddaughter for Christmas. She loves it. So easy to use. Love that 2 batteries come with it so she can always have one charged and ready to use. It has great picture quality for a digital camera I would highly recommend this camera!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for the price
reviews.reviewText: I love the fact that it has USB C. The same cable can be used for transferring data and charging simultaneously. Two batteries are a plus. It looks like you can add a different flash and change the lens, but it doesn’t come with it, so I don’t know how it works. The videos are decent; the settings were pretty straightforward. Just bear in mind that the max SD card memory is 128 GB, but for me, it was more than enough. It comes with an HDMI cable, which is excellent, but I haven’t used it. I connected the camera straight to my PC and was able to transfer the photos. You can also just put the SD card on the computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars 4K is the camera's name, not the quality...
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this camera after being misled of its quality. It is called the "4K CAMERA" but it is not 4K in quality. They mislead people by using the brand name 4K. The image quality is garbage, like my 12mp camera from 15+ years back when webcams were being used...It has a cheap body, buttons are plastic and look like they are wheels or movable but are just stagnant plastic pieces, like something you would see on a kids camera where they allude to it being fancy by its just pretend buttons. The lens looks like it is manual but it is actually just really terrible and cheap. The camera pretends to have high-end features but it is as good as kids camera from Walgreens. I recommend you buy the Nikon Coolpix camera from nearly 15 years ago before you even tough this. For the price, I hoped the pictures would at least look crisp and not blurry, but I set my expectations too high. HARD PASS.
